document_data.title: Races of Faerûn
document_data.author: [[Eric L. Boyd]], [[Matt Forbeck]], and [[James Jacobs]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''Races of Faerûn''' is a sourcebook set in the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]'' for the 3rd-edition ''[[Dungeons & Dragons]]'' ruleset, detailing various races and ethnicities in the Realms.

{{Quote|''Encounter reclusive [[avariel]], arrogant [[Calishite]]s, noble [[centaur]]s, and bold [[Rashemi]]. From the steppes of [[Thay]] to the shores of [[Evermeet]], the inhabitants of the [[Forgotten Realms|Realms]] are as distinct as the regions from which they hail, whether hero, henchman, villain, or villager. With complete information about the noteworthy races, subraces, and ethnicities scattered throughout [[Toril]], ''Races of Faerûn'' offers a detailed look at the many and varied peoples who inhabit the Forgotten Realms game setting.''

* ''80 New feats''
* ''26 New magic items''
* ''8 New monsters'' 
* ''9 New prestige classes''
* ''13 New spells''|}}
document_data.Contents:
* Introduction
* Chapter 1: Dwarves
* Chapter 2: Elves
* Chapter 3: Gnomes
* Chapter 4: Half-Elves
* Chapter 5: Half-Orcs and Orcs
* Chapter 6: Halflings
* Chapter 7: Humans
* Chapter 8: Planetouched
* Chapter 9: Minor Races
* Appendix
